results.title: Comparison of the effects of pentoxifylline, simvastatin, tamoxifen, and losartan on cavernous bodies after penile fracture in rats: a stereological study.
results.text_hl: Moreover, the mean volume of the cavernous bodies decreased in the groups with @<m>DISEASE_Penile_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D010409 @@@PF@@@ that received @CHEMICAL_Pentoxifylline @CHEMICAL_MESH:D010431 @@@pentoxifylline@@@, @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@, @CHEMICAL_Tamoxifen @CHEMICAL_MESH:D013629 @@@tamoxifen@@@, or @CHEMICAL_Losartan @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019808 @@@losartan@@@ when compared with the @<m>DISEASE_Penile_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D010409 @@@PF@@@ group.

citations.NLM: Eslahi A, Shirazi M, Khoshnood O, Noorafshan A, Karbalay-Doust S. Comparison of the effects of pentoxifylline, simvastatin, tamoxifen, and losartan on cavernous bodies after penile fracture in rats: a stereological study. Int J Impot Res. 2020 May;32(3):338-344. PMID: 31427793
